item.name: Command_R to Command_R+Shift_R+Control_R+Option_R
item.appendix: (+ When you type Command_R only, send KANA/EISUU (toggle))
item.autogen: __KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::COMMAND_R, KeyCode::COMMAND_R, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R, KeyCode::VK_JIS_TOGGLE_EISUU_KANA
